snippet: The marketer behind the Teletubbies has a new plan to get into the heads of preschoolers and the pockets of their parents.
abstract: Kenn Viselman, the marketing strategist who helped popularize the Teletubbies in the United States, has set his sights on making local multiplexes toddler-friendly with the movie The Oogieloves in the Big Balloon Adventure; Viselman is keen on gaining access to the huge merchandising market represented by preschoolers
lead_paragraph: The marketer behind the Teletubbies has a new plan to get into the heads of preschoolers and the pockets of their parents.

headline.seo: With ‘Oogieloves,’ a Plan to Make the Multiplex More Toddler-Friendly
headline.main: The Return of Tinky Winky Man
headline.print_headline: The Return of Tinky Winky Man
